name: Aplana Software Services
tagline: Gold Microsoft Partner in Applications Development
description:
We were one of the first custom software development companies to transfer a client’s business to the cloud, making it available to thousands of end-users. Today we continue to innovate and pioneer the use of new platforms and tools.
Aplana has unique expertise in complex cloud solutions; custom software, mobile, blockchain development; big data analytics. 
We work with leading companies worldwide in industries ranging from transportation, oil, and gas to educational, finance and media, as well as government bodies.
Aplana is the Gold Microsoft Partner, Premier Business Partner of IBM and Oracle Gold Partner.
Originally part of one of Eastern Europe’s largest system integrator companies, I.T. Group, Aplana is trusted and the solid partner for the long-term partner-like model.
